data.title: Airport Shuttle Reservation - Leadership and Service Center
data.meta_description: Students interested in using the Student Government Columbia Airport Shuttle service to travel for break should reserve their space online.
data.text:
Riding the Shuttle

The shuttle picks up students at the corner of Greene and Sumter Streets, next to the School of Journalism and Mass Communications. If you miss a scheduled pickup, call the 24/7 shuttle hotline at 803-777-1080.

For Fall Break, the shuttle will pick students up on campus on October 18th & 19th at 5:00A, 9:00A, 12:00P, and 5:00P and pick them up at the airport on October 22nd at 12:00P and 5:00P.

For Thanksgiving Break, the shuttle will pick students up on campus on November 21st & 22nd at 5:00A, 9:00A, 12:00P, and 5:00P and pick them up at the airport on November 26th at 12:00P and 5:00P.
